nodes.text: World of Reading is a maxi-series of books published by Disney Publishing Worldwide targeted at young children with varying levels of reading comprehension. The levels range from Pre-1 to 3. A number of Star Wars titles have been published under the World of Reading label by Disney–Lucasfilm Press, an imprint of Disney Publishing.
The release of titles under the World of Reading banner often coincides with another publishing program such as The Mandalorian publishing program or Journey to Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker.
